data.lyric:
[ti:Shock Da World]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shock Da World - Rod Wave
[00:00.17]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Thomas Horton/Jaidyn Hullum/Cameron Hubler
[00:00.34]Pipe that s**t up TnT
[00:09.88]Jai Beats on the track boy
[00:22.47]Shh shh
[00:40.59]Yeah look look look uh
[00:47.12]I tried to motivate the people but I made 'em angry
[00:49.99]I tried to show 'em it was all love that made 'em hate me
[00:52.99]They criticize me and talk bad 'bout me on the daily
[00:55.87]I get the money and stay out the way they think I'm crazy
[00:58.70]Maybe if I weren't built for this I'd let it phase me
[01:01.56]Can't bend or fold my folks dependin' on for me to make it
[01:04.41]I'm ATR for life the leader of the f**king navy
[01:07.50]This HitHouse entertainment baby we all drive Mercedes
[01:10.20]It's crazy we came a long way to get to this
[01:13.22]I opened up about my pain let the world in
[01:16.12]I know exactly how it feels to come out the bottom
[01:19.30]How the hell you hate on somebody with so much in common
[01:22.02]Stay to myself and get these dollas
[01:23.44]Take care grandma take care mama
[01:24.91]Get the bread and feed my partners
[01:26.56]Never hear my name in drama
[01:28.50]I'm focused on these commas
[01:29.65]F**k a b***h I love my kids they grandmama and they mama
[01:32.42]Don't care about no followers
[01:34.05]I made my first million way before I made it big
[01:36.93]I made my second million way before I made my kids
[01:39.93]My third and fourth million I made 'em the same night
[01:43.10]My fifth million made 'em when they platinumed "Heart on Ice"
[01:45.66]On the phone with the lawyer talkin' 'bout my next five
[01:50.11]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:50.74]Look if I could make ten then I can make a hunnid
[01:54.39]Then I can make a billion we turned nothing into something yeah
[01:56.97]The youngest out my city but the dumbest out my city
[01:59.37]Out my city
[01:59.74]Youngin' ran up some millies ain't have to d**kride to get it
[02:02.37]And I still f**k with Gates but sometimes I'm in my feelings
[02:05.46]I know that it's been a minute I hope your heart finish healing
[02:08.22]It was a long long dark road
[02:12.36]But still he got so far to go
[02:14.08]Look how he shocked the world
[02:15.34]Look how he put the odds to rest look how he overcame
[02:18.22]Look how he showed you he the best still
[02:20.60]You ain't seen nothing yet
[02:25.25]You ain't seen nothing yet yeah
[02:33.59]I swear ayy
[02:34.02]You ain't seen nothing yet yeah
[02:35.69]If you don't like me now boy you finna
[02:37.52]Look how he shocked the world
[02:38.88]Look how he put the odds to rest look how he overcame
[02:42.05]Look how he showed you he the best still
[02:43.60]You ain't seen nothing yet
[02:48.68]
[02:51.30]F**k you if you hate me f**k you you feel me
[02:54.92]Grrah
[02:57.07]Grrah bah bah bah
data.trans:
[ti:Shock Da World]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.34]TnTXD制作
[00:09.88]Jai Beats制作
[00:22.47]//
[00:40.59]侧耳聆听
[00:47.12]我试着激励人们 但是我让他们大发雷霆
[00:49.99]我试着向他们展示我的爱 却让他们对我怀恨在心
[00:52.99]他们每天都批评我 对我恶语相向
[00:55.87]我挣到盆满钵满就潇洒退出 他们因为我失去理智
[00:58.70]如果我并非为此而生 也许我会任其掌控我
[01:01.56]不能妥协退缩 我的家人依赖着我出人头地
[01:04.41]我一生都是ATR 这只队伍的领袖
[01:07.50]这是HitHouse娱乐公司 宝贝 我们都开着奔驰狂飙
[01:10.20]真是疯狂 我们长途跋涉才走到这里
[01:13.22]我敞开心扉倾诉痛苦 让世界走进我心底
[01:16.12]我对从底层社会脱颖而出的感觉了如指掌
[01:19.30]你怎么会对一个与你同病相怜的人恨之入骨
[01:22.02]忠于自己 努力赚钱
[01:23.44]照顾祖母 照顾妈妈
[01:24.91]努力挣钱 维持我同伴的生计
[01:26.56]从未听说我胡作非为
[01:28.50]我专注于这些钞票
[01:29.65]对妹子不屑一顾 我爱我的孩子 以及他们的祖母和妈妈
[01:32.42]我不关心追随我的人
[01:34.05]在我成名以前 我赚到第一个百万美元
[01:36.93]在我的孩子出生以前 我赚到第二个百万美元
[01:39.93]在同一个夜晚 我赚到第三个和第四个百万美元
[01:43.10]当我的《Heart on Ice》这首歌获得白金认证时 我赚到第五个百万美元
[01:45.66]跟律师在电话里谈论着我接下来的五分钟
[01:50.11]//
[01:50.74]听着 如果我可以赚到十块 那我可以赚到一千块
[01:54.39]我可以赚到十亿美元 我们白手起家 出人头地
[01:56.97]我的城市里最年轻的人 却是我的城市里最愚蠢的家伙
[01:59.37]我的城市里
[01:59.74]年轻人积累了一些财富 不需要曲意逢迎就能赚到盆满钵满
[02:02.37]我依然与Gates在一起 可有时我深刻反省
[02:05.46]我知道已经过了一段时间 我希望你的心已经痊愈
[02:08.22]这是一条漫长黑暗的道路
[02:12.36]但是他依然还有很长的路要走
[02:14.08]看着他是如何撼动这世界
[02:15.34]看着他如何胜券在握 看着他如何克服困难
[02:18.22]看着他是如何向你证明他依然无人匹敌
[02:20.60]你眼中所见 不过是冰山一角
[02:25.25]你眼中所见 不过是冰山一角
[02:33.59]我发誓
[02:34.02]你眼中所见 不过是冰山一角
[02:35.69]即使现在你讨厌我 男孩 你最终会喜欢我的
[02:37.52]看着他是如何撼动这世界
[02:38.88]看着他如何胜券在握 看着他如何克服困难
[02:42.05]看着他是如何向你证明他依然无人匹敌
[02:43.60]你眼中所见 不过是冰山一角
[02:48.68]
[02:51.30]去你的 你讨厌我又有何妨 去你的 你是否明白我的感觉
[02:54.92]//
[02:57.07]//
